mapper.select: select distinct t_permission.id, t_permission.title, t_permission.permission from t_user, t_user_role, t_role_permission, t_permission where t_user.id = #{userId} and t_user.id = t_user_role.user_id and t_user_role.role_id = t_role_permission.role_id and t_role_permission.permission_id = t_permission.id
